Welcome to RomanConverter’s documentation!¶

class main.RomanConverter¶
_encode_digit(digit, one, five, nine)¶

Encodes one digit as roman letters

Parameters

  • digit – arabic digit

  • one – roman number representing 1

  • five – roman number representing 5

  • nine – roman number representing 9

Returns

roman letters

decode(roman)¶

Calculate the numeric value of a Roman numeral (in capital letters)

Parameters

roman – roman number

Returns

arabic number

encode(num)¶

Calculate Roman number value from number

Parameters

num – arabic number

Returns

roman number representing arabic number
